fullDescription.intro:
This node normalizes VCF files using Vt. Vt splits, left-aligns and trims all variants. This step is necessary before annotating the file using VEP and loading it into Gemini. Further information can be found at:
http://gemini.readthedocs.org/en/latest/content/preprocessing.html
http://genome.sph.umich.edu/wiki/Variant_Normalization
